TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AsyncCompletedEventHandler(object sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AsyncCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AsyncCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AsyncCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void AsyncCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AsyncCompletedEventArgs ^ e);
type AsyncCompletedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AsyncCompletedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示将处理异步操作的 MethodName 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the *MethodName* event of an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，称为每当事件发生时，事件处理程序方法。The event-handler method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 为调用的异步方法*MethodName*，在组件中，将具有相应*MethodName* `Completed`事件和一个可选*MethodName*`CompletedEventArgs`类。For an asynchronous method, called *MethodName*, in your component, you will have a corresponding *MethodName*`Completed` event, and an optional *MethodName*`CompletedEventArgs` class. 有关支持多个并发调用其异步方法的组件，客户端可以提供一个唯一的标记或任务 ID，以区分的异步任务引发特定事件。For a component that supports multiple concurrent invocations of its asynchronous methods, the client can supply a unique token, or task ID, to distinguish which asynchronous task is raising particular events. 在客户端可以读取属性来确定哪些任务报告已完成。The client's can read the property to determine which task is reporting completion. 您的实现应使用若要创建，将挂起的异步任务的客户端的任务 Id 和相关联。Your implementation should use the to create an that associates the client's task IDs with pending asynchronous tasks. ## Examples 有关的代码示例委派，请参阅中的示例类。For a code example of the delegate, see the example in the class.
